name: Nidoran â™‚

attacks.name: Horn Hazard
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger, more powerful of its horns secretes venom. LV. 20 #32

strengths: Horn Hazard can deal 30 damage for only 1 Grass energy - exceptional efficiency
When successful, has the best damage-to-energy ratio of any Basic Common in Base Set
Level 20 is high for a Basic Pokemon
Low retreat cost of 1 provides mobility
Can knockout many low-HP Pokemon in one hit
weaknesses: Low 40 HP makes it vulnerable to being one-hit knocked out
Horn Hazard has 50% chance to do nothing on tails
Highly unreliable - can flip multiple tails in a row
synergies: PlusPower boosts successful Horn Hazard to 40 damage on heads
Defender helps Nidoran survive despite low HP
Energy Removal can slow opponents while you attempt Horn Hazard
Switch allows retreating after failed attacks
counters: Consistent attackers that don't rely on coin flips
